mapper.select: select * from tb_fm_province
select * from tb_fm_bankcode
select * from tb_fm_trade_info
SELECT * FROM tb_fm_city t WHERE t.province_id = #{province,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM tb_fm_area t WHERE t.city_id = #{city,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM tb_fm_bank_branch t WHERE t.bank_branch_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{interBank,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%')
select t.id,t.category_name from fm_alipay_category t
select t.id,t.first_type,t.second_type,t.third_type from fm_wx_category t GROUP BY first_type
select t.id,t.first_type,t.second_type,t.third_type from fm_wx_category t where first_type = #{firstType,jdbcType = VARCHAR} GROUP BY second_type
select t.id,t.first_type,t.second_type,t.third_type from fm_wx_category t where second_type = #{secondType,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and first_type=#{firstType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
select t.id,t.second_type,t.third_type from fm_jd_category t GROUP BY second_type
select t.id,t.second_type,t.third_type from fm_jd_category t where second_type = #{secondType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT c.*, t.* FROM td_cust_info c INNER JOIN td_login_user_info t ON c.cust_id = t.cust_id WHERE c.MERCHANT_CODE = #{merchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND c.STATE = '00' AND t.STATE = '00' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `stcdb`.`td_merchant_report` ( `id`, `merchant_code`, `patch_no`, `channel_no`, `report_status`, `report_time` ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{merchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{patchNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{channelNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{reportStatus,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, now() )

INSERT INTO `stcdb`.`td_merchant_detail_info` ( `patch_no`, `merchant_code`, `report_status`, `file_status`, `out_merchant_code`, `remark`, `create_time`, `modify_time`, `prov_code`, `city_code`, `contry_code`, `bank_code`, `branch_bank_code`, `branch_bank_name`, `mobile_no`, `customer_Phone`, `qq`, `power_id`, `app_id`, `category`, `loginNo`, `bestMerchantType`, `bestpayMctNo`, `rate`, `zfb_batch_no`, `zfb_batch_status`, `zfb_user_id`, `zfb_auth_app_id`, `zfb_app_auth_token`, `zfb_app_refresh_token`, `zfb_expires_in`, `zfb_re_expires_in`, `zfb_account`, `account_number`
) VALUES ( #{patchNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{merchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{reportStatus,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{fileStatus,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{outMerchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, now(), now(), #{provCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{contryCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{bankCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{branchBankCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{branchBankName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mobileNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{customerPhone,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{powerId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{loginNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{bestMerchantType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{bestpayMctNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zfbBatchNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zfbBatchStatus,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zfbUserId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zfbAuthAppId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zfbAppAuthToken,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zfbAppRefreshToken,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zfbExpiresIn,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zfbReExpiresIn,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{zfbAccount,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{accountNumber,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE `stcdb`.`td_merchant_detail_info` SET
`report_status` = #{reportStatus,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`file_status` = #{fileStatus,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`out_merchant_code` = #{outMerchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`remark` = #{remark,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`bestMerchantType` = #{bestMerchantType,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`loginNo` = #{loginNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`bestpayMctNo` = #{bestpayMctNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`result_msg` = #{resultMsg,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_batch_no` = #{zfbBatchNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_batch_status` = #{zfbBatchStatus,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_user_id` = #{zfbUserId,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_auth_app_id` = #{zfbAuthAppId,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_app_auth_token` = #{zfbAppAuthToken,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_app_refresh_token` = #{zfbAppRefreshToken,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_expires_in` = #{zfbExpiresIn,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_re_expires_in` = #{zfbReExpiresIn,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_confirm_url` = #{zfbConfirmUrl,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`merchant_pid` = #{merchantPid,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`sign_url` = #{signUrl,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`sign_qrcode` = #{signQrcode,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`wx_apply_no` = #{wxApplyNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`iden_status` = #{idenStatus,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`wx_child_no` = #{wxChildNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`zfb_child_no` = #{zfbChildNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
`modify_time` = now() WHERE `patch_no` = #{patchNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR} or `out_merchant_code` = #{outMerchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
update td_cust_info t SET t.filing_status = '01' WHERE t.MERCHANT_CODE = #{merchantCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM td_merchant_report t1 WHERE t1.`merchant_code` = #{merchantCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and t1.channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ORDER BY t1.report_time DESC limit 1
select * from td_merchant_industry_info
select DISTINCT t.category_id, t.category_name from td_suixing_mcc_info t
SELECT DISTINCT b.province_id, b.province_name FROM td_suixing_bank_city_info b ORDER BY b.province_id
SELECT t.city_id, t.city_name FROM td_suixing_bank_city_info t WHERE t.province_id = #{province,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT t.* FROM td_suixing_merchant_city_info t WHERE t.superior_area_code = #{superiorAreaCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT t.* FROM td_suixing_merchant_city_info t WHERE t.area_type = #{areaType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
select * from td_sumpay_bank_info s
select t.* from td_sumpay_merchant_city_info t where t.superior_area_code = #{superiorAreaCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT DISTINCT z.level_one FROM td_sumpay_zfb_mcc_info z
SELECT DISTINCT z.level_two FROM td_sumpay_zfb_mcc_info z where z.level_one = #{one,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT DISTINCT z.level_one FROM td_sumpay_wx_mcc_info z
SELECT DISTINCT z.level_two FROM td_sumpay_wx_mcc_info z where z.level_one = #{one,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT DISTINCT z.* FROM td_sumpay_zfb_info z
SELECT DISTINCT c.province_name, c.area_code FROM td_yqb_city_info c where c.city_name ='' and c.area_name = ''

SELECT DISTINCT c.city_name, c.area_code FROM td_yqb_city_info c where c.area_name = '' and c.city_name !='' and c.province_name = (SELECT d.province_name FROM td_yqb_city_info d WHERE d.area_code =#{areaCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )

SELECT DISTINCT c.area_name, c.area_code FROM td_yqb_city_info c where c.area_name !='' and c.city_name = (SELECT d.city_name FROM td_yqb_city_info d WHERE d.area_code =#{areaCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
SELECT DISTINCT m.level_one FROM td_yqb_mcc_info m
